md:
giải nghĩa từ "helpful" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Helpful** (adjective)

* Meaning: được giúp đỡ, hữu ích
* Part of speech: adjective
* Example sentence: "The teacher was very helpful in explaining the difficult math concept."
* Related words: assist, aid, support, useful, beneficial
* Antonyms: unhelpful, useless, harmful

**Helpful** (adjective)

* Meaning: sẵn sàng giúp đỡ, tốt bụng
* Part of speech: adjective
* Example sentence: "My friend was very helpful and lent me his car when mine broke down."
* Related words: kind, generous, willing, supportive, cooperative
* Antonyms: unhelpful, unwilling, uncooperative

Note: Depending on the context, "helpful" can have different meanings and connotations. The above explanations are just two possible interpretations of the word.
